biotools.summary:
Predicting changes in protein thermodynamic stability upon point mutation with deep 3D convolutional neural networks.

ThermoNet is a computational framework for quantitative prediction of the changes in protein thermodynamic stability () caused by single-point amino acid substitutions. The core algorithm of ThermoNet is an ensemble of deep 3D convolutional neural networks. ThermoNet was compared with a large set of predictors and was shown to perform equally well as the best methods in the field while effectively addressing prediction bias.
